Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26964 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.2.0.azl0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-26964 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.2.0.azl0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers is earlier than 3.2.0.azl0-2, affected by CVE-2023-26964
